briefdescription.para: typedef for object returned from self().

detaileddescription.para: This type is only guaranteed to be passable to connect and disconnect. No other assumptions should be made about it.

briefdescription.para: public constructor for hier_block2
Private implementation details of gr::hier_block2.
Return an object, representing the current block, which can be passed to connect.

detaileddescription.para: The returned object may only be used as an argument to connect or disconnect. Any other use of self() results in unspecified (erroneous) behavior.

briefdescription.para: Add a stand-alone (possibly hierarchical) block to internal graph.

detaileddescription.para: This adds a gr-block or hierarchical block to the internal graph without wiring it to anything else.

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, int src_port, basic_block_sptr dst, int dst_port)
memberdef.name: connect

briefdescription.para: Add gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks to internal graph and wire together.

detaileddescription.para: This adds (if not done earlier by another connect) a pair of gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks to the internal flowgraph, and wires the specified output port to the specified input port.

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, pmt::pmt_t srcport, basic_block_sptr dst, pmt::pmt_t dstport)
memberdef.name: msg_connect

briefdescription.para: Add gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks to internal graph and wire together.

detaileddescription.para: This adds (if not done earlier by another connect) a pair of gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks to the internal message port subscription

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, std::string srcport, basic_block_sptr dst, std::string dstport)
memberdef.name: msg_connect

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, pmt::pmt_t srcport, basic_block_sptr dst, pmt::pmt_t dstport)
memberdef.name: msg_disconnect

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, std::string srcport, basic_block_sptr dst, std::string dstport)
memberdef.name: msg_disconnect

briefdescription.para: Remove a gr-block or hierarchical block from the internal flowgraph.

detaileddescription.para: This removes a gr-block or hierarchical block from the internal flowgraph, disconnecting it from other blocks as needed.

memberdef.argsstring: (basic_block_sptr src, int src_port, basic_block_sptr dst, int dst_port)
memberdef.name: disconnect

briefdescription.para: Disconnect a pair of gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks in internal flowgraph.

detaileddescription.para: This disconnects the specified input port from the specified output port of a pair of gr-blocks or hierarchical blocks.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect all connections in the internal flowgraph.

detaileddescription.para: This call removes all output port to input port connections in the internal flowgraph.
Lock a flowgraph in preparation for reconfiguration. When an equal number of calls to lock() and unlock() have occurred, the flowgraph will be reconfigured.
N.B. lock() and unlock() may not be called from a flowgraph thread (E.g., gr::block::work method) or deadlock will occur when reconfiguration happens.
Unlock a flowgraph in preparation for reconfiguration. When an equal number of calls to lock() and unlock() have occurred, the flowgraph will be reconfigured.
N.B. lock() and unlock() may not be called from a flowgraph thread (E.g., gr::block::work method) or deadlock will occur when reconfiguration happens.

briefdescription.para: Returns max buffer size (itemcount) on output port i.
Sets max buffer size (itemcount) on all output ports.
Sets max buffer size (itemcount) on output port port.
Returns min buffer size (itemcount) on output port i.
Sets min buffer size (itemcount) on all output ports.
Sets min buffer size (itemcount) on output port port.
Set the affinity of all blocks in hier_block2 to processor core n.

parameterdescription.para: a vector of ints of the core numbers available to this block.

briefdescription.para: Remove processor affinity for all blocks in hier_block2.
Get the current processor affinity.

detaileddescription.para: This returns the processor affinity value for the first block in the hier_block2's list of blocks with the assumption that they have always only been set through the hier_block2's interface. If any block has been individually set, then this call could be misleading.

briefdescription.para: Get if all block min buffers should be set.

detaileddescription.para: this returns whether all the block min output buffers should be set or just the block ports connected to the hier ports.

briefdescription.para: Get if all block max buffers should be set.

detaileddescription.para: this returns whether all the block max output buffers should be set or just the block ports connected to the hier ports.

briefdescription.para: Hierarchical container class for gr::block's and gr::hier_block2's.
